commits.content:
Section,Item,Definition
L1,DATA,Data platforms architecture processing analytics governance and streaming
L1,SOFTWARE,Software design architecture patterns and principles
L1,CLOUD,Cloud infrastructure networking services and resilience
L1,DEVOPS,Development operations deployment observability and reliability
L1,SECURITY,Security access encryption testing and compliance
L1,AI/ML,Artificial intelligence machine learning and generative AI
L1,PM,Project management product management and agile practices
L1,PROGRAMMING,Data structures algorithms and complexity analysis
L1,BUSINESS,Business finance contracts and performance metrics
L2,DATA|Platform,Azure Databricks Fabric Power BI technologies and services
L2,DATA|Architecture,Data structures schemas modeling (Star Schema Lakehouse)

L2,DATA|BI,Dimensional modeling OLAP reporting measures DAX
L2,DATA|Governance,Policies ownership classification compliance stewardship

L2,CLOUD|Infrastructure,IaC containers compute storage Kubernetes Docker

L2,CLOUD|Resilience,HA DR scaling fault tolerance RPO RTO

L2,DEVOPS|Observability,Monitoring logging tracing alerting metrics

L2,SECURITY|Access,IAM RBAC authentication authorization SSO MFA

L2,SECURITY|Compliance,Standards auditing policies SIEM SOAR frameworks
L2,AI/ML|Models,Architectures types neural networks CNN Transformer

L2,AI/ML|Evaluation,Metrics validation Precision Recall Confusion Matrix

PRIORITY,Core,Must know - foundational for competence
PRIORITY,Advanced,Learn when needed - specialist depth
PRIORITY,Core-N,Must know within niche domain (platform-specific)
PRIORITY,Advanced-N,Specialist within niche domain (platform-specific)
